impactFactors.description: These are some factors that impact the issue you are seeing.
impactFactors.title: Why this happened

infoModal.description:
We predict your battery health using machine learning. Just like humans, machines learn from past experiences, so we use historical data from your car and others like it to come up with our recommendations. 

Our models are great but they don't always get it right, so always book a diagnostic test at a garage to determine what repairs are needed.
infoModal.title: What's causing these faults to be detected?

drivingFrequency.description: Your average number of trips in the last two weeks was higher than our averages.  This is good news for your battery, allowing it to recharge and improving it's lifespan.
drivingFrequency.title: Driving frequency

tripLength.description: Your average trip duration in the last two weeks was lower than our averages.  Lots of short trips prevent your battery from recharging and can shorten it's lifespan, especially in older batteries.
tripLength.title: Trip length

voltage.description: Your battery voltage is irregular and can be a lead indicator of poor battery health.
voltage.title: Voltage

weather.description: An outside temperature drop is coming . Many batteries need to be replaced when the temperature drops outside, especially if it's near the end of it's life.
weather.title: Weather

recommendation.title: Learn more about how to keep your Battery in top condition.
